Projection Transformation

  • View space â†’ NDC (normalized device coordinate system)ë¡œ ë³€í™˜

pc=Ppv\mathbf{p_c=Pp_v} pcâ€‹=Ppvâ€‹

ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ

Windowing Transformation

  • ì‚¬ê°í˜• ê³µê°„ ë‚´ ì  (px,Â py)(p_x,~p_y)(pxâ€‹,Â pyâ€‹)ì„ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì‚¬ê°í˜• ê³µê°„ì˜ ëŒ€ì‘ ì  (pxâ€²,Â pyâ€²)(p_x',~p_y')(pxâ€²â€‹,Â pyâ€²â€‹)ë¡œ ë§¤í•‘í•˜ëŠ” ë³€í™˜
    • ì˜ˆ: (xl,Â yl)(x_l,~y_l)(xlâ€‹,Â ylâ€‹) ~ (xr,Â yr)(x_r,~y_r)(xrâ€‹,Â yrâ€‹) â†’ (xlâ€²,Â ylâ€²)(x_l',~y_l')(xlâ€²â€‹,Â ylâ€²â€‹) ~ (xrâ€²,Â yrâ€²)(x_r',~y_r')(xrâ€²â€‹,Â yrâ€²â€‹)

pxâ€²=(pxâˆ’xlxrâˆ’xl)(xrâ€²âˆ’xlâ€²)+xlâ€²pyâ€²=(pyâˆ’ylyrâˆ’yl)(yrâ€²âˆ’ylâ€²)+ylâ€²p'_x = \left( \frac{p_x - x_l}{x_r - x_l} \right)(x_r' - x_l') + x_l' \\ p'_y = \left( \frac{p_y - y_l}{y_r - y_l} \right)(y_r' - y_l') + y_l' pxâ€²â€‹=(xrâ€‹âˆ’xlâ€‹pxâ€‹âˆ’xlâ€‹â€‹)(xrâ€²â€‹âˆ’xlâ€²â€‹)+xlâ€²â€‹pyâ€²â€‹=(yrâ€‹âˆ’ylâ€‹pyâ€‹âˆ’ylâ€‹â€‹)(yrâ€²â€‹âˆ’ylâ€²â€‹)+ylâ€²â€‹

Orthographic Projection Matrix

  • 3Dê¹Œì§€ í™•ì¥í•˜ê³ , ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ì´ ëŒ€ì…:

    xh=right,xl=left,xhâ€²=1,xlâ€²=âˆ’1yh=top,yl=bottom,yhâ€²=1,ylâ€²=âˆ’1zh=âˆ’far,zl=âˆ’near,zhâ€²=1,zlâ€²=âˆ’1\begin{aligned} x_h &= \text{right},\quad x_l = \text{left},\quad x_h' = 1,\quad x_l' = -1 \\ y_h &= \text{top},\quad y_l = \text{bottom},\quad y_h' = 1,\quad y_l' = -1 \\ z_h &= -\text{far},\quad z_l = -\text{near},\quad z_h' = 1,\quad z_l' = -1 \end{aligned} xhâ€‹yhâ€‹zhâ€‹â€‹=right,xlâ€‹=left,xhâ€²â€‹=1,xlâ€²â€‹=âˆ’1=top,ylâ€‹=bottom,yhâ€²â€‹=1,ylâ€²â€‹=âˆ’1=âˆ’far,zlâ€‹=âˆ’near,zhâ€²â€‹=1,zlâ€²â€‹=âˆ’1â€‹

    Porth=[2rightâˆ’left00âˆ’right+leftrightâˆ’left02topâˆ’bottom0âˆ’top+bottomtopâˆ’bottom00âˆ’2farâˆ’nearâˆ’far+nearfarâˆ’near0001]\mathbf{P}_{\text{orth}} = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{2}{\text{right} - \text{left}} & 0 & 0 & -\frac{\text{right} + \text{left}}{\text{right} - \text{left}} \\ 0 & \frac{2}{\text{top} - \text{bottom}} & 0 & -\frac{\text{top} + \text{bottom}}{\text{top} - \text{bottom}} \\ 0 & 0 & \frac{-2}{\text{far} - \text{near}} & -\frac{\text{far} + \text{near}}{\text{far} - \text{near}} \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix} Porthâ€‹=â€‹rightâˆ’left2â€‹000â€‹0topâˆ’bottom2â€‹00â€‹00farâˆ’nearâˆ’2â€‹0â€‹âˆ’rightâˆ’leftright+leftâ€‹âˆ’topâˆ’bottomtop+bottomâ€‹âˆ’farâˆ’nearfar+nearâ€‹1â€‹â€‹

First, 3D View Frustum â†’ 3D Cuboid

  • ìš°ì„ ì€ canonical volumeì´ ì•„ë‹Œ, near, far í‰ë©´ì´ ê°™ì€ ìœ„ì¹˜ì˜ cuboidë¥¼ ê³ ë ¤
  • x, y ì¢Œí‘œì— ëŒ€í•´ ì´ì „ ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë“œì™€ ê°™ì€ ë°©ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ íˆ¬ì˜ ê°€ëŠ¥:

    • í•´ê²°: zzz ê°’ì„ ì ì ˆíˆ ë§¤í•‘í•˜ì—¬ near/far í‰ë©´ì˜ ê¹Šì´ ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ìœ ì§€

3D View Frustum â†’ 3D Cuboid

  • zzz ê°’ê¹Œì§€ í¬í•¨í•˜ì—¬ ì „ì²´ë¥¼ í–‰ë ¬ë¡œ í‘œí˜„:

    [xâ€²yâ€²zâ€²1]=[âˆ’dxzâˆ’dyzâˆ’Xz1]=[dz0000dz0000ab00âˆ’10][xyz1]\begin{bmatrix} x' \\ y' \\ z' \\ 1 \end{bmatrix} = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{-d x}{z} \\ \frac{-d y}{z} \\ \frac{-X}{z} \\ 1 \end{bmatrix} = \begin{bmatrix} d z & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & d z & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & a & b \\ 0 & 0 & -1 & 0 \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} x \\ y \\ z \\ 1 \end{bmatrix} â€‹xâ€²yâ€²zâ€²1â€‹â€‹=â€‹zâˆ’dxâ€‹zâˆ’dyâ€‹zâˆ’Xâ€‹1â€‹â€‹=â€‹dz000â€‹0dz00â€‹00aâˆ’1â€‹00b0â€‹â€‹â€‹xyz1â€‹â€‹

  • xxx, yyyì—ëŠ” ì˜í–¥ ì—†ìŒ â†’ zâ€²z'zâ€²ëŠ” xxx, yyyì™€ ë¬´ê´€

    • ë”°ë¼ì„œ c0=c1=0c_0 = c_1 = 0c0â€‹=c1â€‹=0

  • ì›í•˜ëŠ” ì¡°ê±´:

    • zâ€²(âˆ’n)=nz'(-n) = nzâ€²(âˆ’n)=n
    • zâ€²(âˆ’f)=fz'(-f) = fzâ€²(âˆ’f)=f

  • ì„ í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ zâ€²z'zâ€² ì •ì˜:

    zâ€²(z)=az+bâˆ’zz'(z) = \frac{a z + b}{-z} zâ€²(z)=âˆ’zaz+bâ€‹

  • ë‘ ì¡°ê±´ì„ ëŒ€ì…í•˜ì—¬ í•´ êµ¬í•¨:

    a=fn,b=f+na = f n,\quad b = f + n a=fn,b=f+n

Final: 3D View Frustum â†’ 3D Canonical View Volume

  • Ppers=P_orthâ‹…P_dc\mathbf{P}_{\text{pers}} = \mathbf{P}\_{\text{orth}} \cdot \mathbf{P}\_{\text{dc}}Ppersâ€‹=P_orthâ‹…P_dc

  • Pdc\mathbf{P}_{\text{dc}}Pdcâ€‹ í–‰ë ¬ (near, far ë°˜ì˜):

    Pdc=[n0000n0000f+nfn00âˆ’10]\mathbf{P}_{\text{dc}} = \begin{bmatrix} n & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & n & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & f + n & f n \\ 0 & 0 & -1 & 0 \end{bmatrix} Pdcâ€‹=â€‹n000â€‹0n00â€‹00f+nâˆ’1â€‹00fn0â€‹â€‹

  • frustum â†’ cuboid â†’ canonical volume ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€í™˜

Perspective Projection Matrix

  • ìµœì¢… perspective projection í–‰ë ¬:

    P_pers=Porthâ‹…P_dc=[nr0000nt0000f+nnâˆ’ffnnâˆ’f00âˆ’10]\mathbf{P}\_{\text{pers}} = \mathbf{P}_{\text{orth}} \cdot \mathbf{P}\_{\text{dc}} = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{n}{r} & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & \frac{n}{t} & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & \frac{f + n}{n - f} & \frac{f n}{n - f} \\ 0 & 0 & -1 & 0 \end{bmatrix} P_pers=Porthâ€‹â‹…P_dc=â€‹rnâ€‹000â€‹0tnâ€‹00â€‹00nâˆ’ff+nâ€‹âˆ’1â€‹00nâˆ’ffnâ€‹0â€‹â€‹

Quiz 2

Viewport Transformation

  • Viewport transformationì€ NDC ê³µê°„ì—ì„œ í™”ë©´ ê³µê°„(screen space)ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€í™˜
  • ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ ë‹¨ê³„ì˜ ë³€í™˜: clip space â†’ screen space
  • ì¢Œí‘œê³„ ë²”ìœ„:
    • NDC: (âˆ’1,Â âˆ’1,Â âˆ’1)(-1,~-1,~-1)(âˆ’1,Â âˆ’1,Â âˆ’1) ~ (1,Â 1,Â 1)(1,~1,~1)(1,Â 1,Â 1)

    1. ê°ì²´ ë°°ì¹˜ â†’ Modeling transformation

  • Canonical view volume (NDC)ì—ì„œ zzzë°©í–¥ +ë¥¼ ê¸°ì¤€ìœ¼ë¡œ ë‚´ë ¤ë‹¤ë³¸ë‹¤ê³  ê°€ì •

Viewport Transformation Matrix

  • windowing transformation matrixì—ì„œ,

    • xpx_pxpâ€‹, xlx_lxlâ€‹, xhx_hxhâ€‹ ... ëŒ€ì‹  viewport ë³€ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ëŒ€ì…í•¨

  • ë³€í™˜ í–‰ë ¬:

    T_vp=[width200width2+x_minâ¡0height20height2+y_minâ¡0012120001]\mathbf{T}\_{\text{vp}} = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{\text{width}}{2} & 0 & 0 & \frac{\text{width}}{2} + x\_{\min} \\ 0 & \frac{\text{height}}{2} & 0 & \frac{\text{height}}{2} + y\_{\min} \\ 0 & 0 & \frac{1}{2} & \frac{1}{2} \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix} T_vp=â€‹2widthâ€‹000â€‹02heightâ€‹00â€‹0021â€‹0â€‹2widthâ€‹+x_min2heightâ€‹+y_min21â€‹1â€‹â€‹
